{{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} === Servers === You need to configure at least one server from where to consume emails. A configuration targets a mail server and a specific folder in this server, the one that should contain the mails to be read. You can target several servers with this application. You should have access to this mail account and folder, as some maintenance might be needed (removing old mails, forcing reload of badly loaded mails, ...). #if ($nbServers == 0) {{warning}}<< no mail server defined, please add at least one server configuration>>{{/warning}} #else #set($collist = [ "id", "hostname", "protocol", "folder", "user", "status", "state", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "id" : {"type" : "text", "link" : "view" }, "hostname" : { "type" : "text" }, "protocol" : { "type" : "text" }, "folder" : { "type" : "text" }, "user" : { "type" : "text" }, "status" : { "type" : "text", "html": "true" }, "state" : { "type" : "text" }, "_actions" : {"actions": ["check","edit","delete"]} } ) #set($options = { "className":"MailArchiveCode.ServerClass", "resultPage":"MailArchiveCode.LiveTableResults", "selectedColumn":"hostname", "tagCloud":"false", "defaultOrder":"asc", "translationPrefix" : "mailarchive.servers.table.headers.", "rowCount": 10, "extraParams" : "&space=MailArchivePrefs" }) #livetable("livetable_servers" $collist $colprops $options) #end
Add Server...
=== Stores === Additionnally, you can configure Stores, to import emails from archives stored on filesystem. They can be used to import threads from existing mailing-lists. Note: a Store can be managed exactly as a Server. Store archive file must be present on XWiki server filesystem so you must manually upload or copy it there to start with - for now there is no built-in upload feature. #if($nbStores == 0) {{info}} No store defined. {{/info}} #else #set($collist = [ "id", "format", "location", "folder", "status", "state", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "id" : {"type" : "text", "link" : "view" }, "format" : { "type" : "text" }, "location" : { "type" : "text" }, "folder" : { "type" : "text" }, "status" : { "type" : "text", "html" : "true" }, "state" : { "type" : "text" }, "_actions" : {"actions": ["check","edit","delete"]} } ) #set($options = { "className":"MailArchiveCode.StoreClass", "resultPage":"MailArchiveCode.LiveTableResults", "selectedColumn":"hostname", "tagCloud":"false", "defaultOrder":"asc", "translationPrefix" : "mailarchive.stores.table.headers.", "rowCount": 10, "extraParams" : "&space=MailArchivePrefs" }) #livetable("livetable_stores" $collist $colprops $options) #end
